title: Implement Web Audio spectrogram for SCAN playback
description: Build a reusable React component that taps into the terminal audio stream, drives a Web Audio analyser, and renders a colorful spectrogram while SCAN is active.
acceptance_criteria: - Attach analyser without breaking or duplicating audio output.\n- Render a continuously updating spectrogram with Signal-23 styling.\n- Dispose of animation and audio hooks cleanly when SCAN stops.
notes: Reset the spectrogram audio graph when scans stop so subsequent runs rebuild a fresh AudioContext and MediaElement source.

title: QA scan spectrogram and terminal messaging
description: Exercise the SCAN flow across supported browsers and breakpoints to confirm the visualization, fallback messaging, and terminal prompts behave as expected.
acceptance_criteria: - Confirm overlay renders with live audio on Chrome, Firefox, and Safari.\n- Verify fallback notice appears when the analyser API is blocked.\n- Validate terminal input remains responsive and SCAN toggling terminates playback cleanly.
